title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.14 - Service and notice by the Board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.14 - Service and notice by the Board

State Regulations

Service and notice by the Board may be by postage-prepaid
first class mail, electronic mail or personal delivery unless otherwise agreed
by the parties to a proceeding or ordered by the Board. For petitions filed
electronically, service and notice will take place through electronic mail
unless petitioner requests an alternative method permitted by these
rules. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12

65.14

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
